<title level="1" right="Spell 9" pfs="Standard">
[Bind Soul](/Spells.aspx?ID=21)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=64" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 320 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

**Requirements** black sapphire with a gp value of at least the target's level × 100
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature that died within the last minute
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** unlimited
</row>

</column>

---

You wrench the target's soul away before it can pass on to the afterlife and imprison it in a black sapphire.

 While the soul is in the gem, the target can't be returned to life through any means, even powerful magic such as [_wish_](/Spells.aspx?ID=377). If the gem is destroyed or _bind soul_ is counteracted on the gem, the soul is freed. The gem has AC 16 and Hardness 10. A gem can't hold more than one soul, and any attempt wastes the spell.

requirement: black sapphire with a gp value of at least the target's level × 100
